director.name: 莉莉娅·英戈尔夫斯多蒂尔 Lilja Ingolfsdottir

this_title: The Things I Wish You Had Told Me, But Never Will
trans_title: 我希望你已经告诉我，但永远不会告诉我的事情
introduction: A meeting between a young woman and her father in a hotell room in Oslo. A crystal of impossible and possible timelines, reveals aspects of intimacy and broken connection between father and daughter.
chinese_title: 我希望你已经告诉我，但永远不会告诉我的事情
foreign_title: The Things I Wish You Had Told Me, But Never Will
